text: Idrissa Traoré Essien (born 6 May 1991) is a Malian international footballer who plays for Zakho FC, as a midfielder. ==Club career== Born in Bamako, Traoré has played for Requins de l'Atlantique, Real Bamako, Djoliba, Stade Gabèsien, Stade Malien, Vita Club, Darnes and Shabaab al Jabal. On 14 August 2019 Omani club Sohar SC confirmed, that they had signed Traoré.مجلس إدارة النادي يكسب خدمات لاعب الوسط المالي 💚 ادريس تراوري ، قادما من نادي #شباب_الجبل الليبي, twitter.com, 14 August 2019 ==International career== He made his international debut for Mali in 2015. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Malian footballers Category:Mali international footballers Category:Requins de l'Atlantique FC players Category:AS Real Bamako players Category:Djoliba AC players Category:Stade Gabèsien players Category:Stade Malien players Category:AS Vita Club players Category:Darnes SC players Category:Shabaab al Jabal players Category:Sohar SC players Category:Sportspeople from Bamako Category:Association football midfielders Category:Malian expatriate footballers Category:Malian expatriate sportspeople in Benin Category:Expatriate footballers in Benin Category:Malian expatriate sportspeople in Tunisia Category:Expatriate footballers in Tunisia Category:Malian expatriate sportspeople in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Expatriate footballers in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Malian expatriate sportspeople in Libya Category:Expatriate footballers in Libya Category:Malian expatriate sportspeople in Oman Category:Expatriate footballers in Oman
title: Idrissa Traoré (footballer, born 1991)
